Module: hbpCollaboratoryAppToolkit

Methods

(static) context(callbackopt)

Asynchronously retrieve the current HBP Collaboratory Context, including the mode, the ctx UUID and the application state if any.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
callback hbpCollaboratoryContextCallback <optional>
 receiver of the call

Type Definitions

HbpCollaboratoryContext

Type:
  • object
Properties:
Name Type Description
mode string the current mode, either 'run' or 'edit'
ctx string the UUID of the current context
state string an application defined state string
